name: PLEASE somebody help the BABY FISH eat the right thing!
name_original: PLEASE somebody help the BABY FISH eat the right thing!
description:
Made in about 2 weeks (working an hour a day not everyday) for the #SEAJAM game jam.

In this game you have to help baby fish to eat the right food because they don't know the difference between trash and food.

How 2 play:

Click anywhere on the screen to send the fishes there.

If the fish get too hungry they'll die.

If the fish eat trash 5 of them will die.

Help them for 3 minutes until they grow up.

Please consider donating to team seas at https://teamseas.org
